content.content: The Content Production Core Unit is responsible for creating, and supporting the creation of written, audio, and visual content that educates audiences on MakerDAO, promotes the work and culture of the ecosystem, and encourages people to use Dai and the Maker Protocol. See their mandate here. Membership of Content Production can be seen in the @Content-Production group.  A Core Unit is a building block for organizing work for the DAO. Facilitators define long-term work areas and cover a broad set of focus and responsibilities for the protocol to be secure and successful. Core Unit Mandates set the direction of the work that Facilitators must help carry out. To read more about Core Units, head to MIP39: Core Unit Framework.
